actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a tax credit for solar and wind energy property installed on an individual's principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a limited income tax credit for expenses incurred for the installation of solar or wind energy equipment in their principal residences. Terminates this credit after 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a tax credit for solar and wind energy property installed on an individual's principal residence.
